#summary Xerox Phaser 6130 Imaging Unit EEPROM

= What's this? =

The imaging unit of the Xerox 6130 printer also has a page counter built in. The Information is stored in a EEPROM similar to that in the cartridges. 

Information about how to read this information out can be found [http://xeroxpatrone.googlecode.com/files/6130_ImageUnit_Connector.pdf here].

A EEPROM dump is available [http://xeroxpatrone.googlecode.com/files/6130_ImageUnit_1073pages.bin here].
